card_text: Activate 1 of these effects;$N●If you control a "Tistina" monster: Banish 1 card from your opponent's GY, face-down.$N●If you control a "Tistina" monster Special Summoned from the Extra Deck: Banish all cards from your opponent's GY, face-down.$NYou can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 "Tistina" monster in your GY; add it to your hand. You can only use 1 "Discordance of the Tistina" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
